languages.text: Как только клинок рассек бледную плоть, дикий вой волной пронесся по грузовому отсеку! Сервоприводы взвизгнули и затрещали. Словно ощутив боль, раненный сервитор силился распахнуть зашитую пасть, но из нее вырвался лишь сдавленный, полный ужаса стон. Жертва Лорд-капитана рухнула на металлический пол и все остальные сервиторы с грохотом упали следом. Потусторонний холод, пронзающий до самых костей, окутал всех нас.

traits.locale_text: Как только клинок рассек бледную плоть, дикий вой волной пронесся по грузовому отсеку! Сервоприводы взвизгнули и затрещали. Словно ощутив боль, раненный сервитор силился распахнуть зашитую пасть, но из нее вырвался лишь сдавленный, полный ужаса стон. Жертва Лорд-капитана рухнула на металлический пол и все остальные сервиторы с грохотом упали следом. Потусторонним холод, пронзающий до самых костей, окутал всех нас.

languages.text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.
languages.original_text: Как только клинок рассек бледную плоть, дикий вой волной пронесся по грузовому отсеку! Сервоприводы взвизгнули и затрещали. Словно ощутив боль, раненный сервитор силился распахнуть зашитую пасть, но из нее вырвался лишь сдавленный, полный ужаса стон. Жертва Лорд-капитана рухнула на металлический пол и все остальные сервиторы с грохотом упали следом. Потусторонний холод, пронзающий до самых костей, окутал всех нас.

traits.locale_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal floor, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

languages.text: 刃が蒼白な肉を切り裂いた瞬間、貨物ベイに荒々しい叫び声が響き渡った！サーボモーターの金切り音とパチパチという音が聞こえた。まるで痛みを感じる能力を取り戻したかのように、 傷ついたサーヴィターは縫い合わせられた口を開こうと奮闘したが、出てきたのは押し殺された恐怖のうめき声だけだった。ロード・キャプテンの犠牲者は金属甲板の上に倒れ、他のすべてのサーヴィターも一緒に崩れ落ちた。我々は皆、異世界からの骨の凍りつくような寒さを感じた。
languages.original_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

traits.locale_text: 刃が蒼白な肉を切り裂いた瞬間、貨物ベイに荒々しい叫び声が響き渡った！サーボモーターの金切り音とパチパチという音が聞こえた。まるで痛みを感じる能力を取り戻したかのように、 傷ついたサーヴィターは縫い合わせられた口を開こうと奮闘したが、出てきたのは押し殺された恐怖のうめき声だけだった。ロード・キャプテンの犠牲者は金属甲板の上に倒れ、他のすべてのサーヴィターも一緒に崩れ落ちた。我々は皆、異世界からの骨の凍りつくような寒さを感じた。

languages.text: À l'instant où la lame trancha sa chair blafarde, un hurlement sauvage retentit dans la soute ! Nous entendîmes le crissement et le crépitement des servomoteurs. Comme s'il était horrifié et de nouveau capable de ressentir la douleur, le servitor blessé tenta d'ouvrir la bouche, mais à cause des sutures qui la maintenaient close, il ne put que pousser un terrible gémissement étouffé. La victime {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} s'effondra sur le sol métallique, suivi immédiatement par tous les autres servitors. Nous ressentîmes alors tous l'étreinte d'un froid mordant qui n'avait rien de naturel.
languages.original_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

traits.locale_text: À l'instant où la lame trancha sa chair blafarde, un hurlement sauvage retentit dans la soute ! Nous entendîmes le crissement et le crépitement des servomoteurs. Comme s'il était horrifié et de nouveau capable de ressentir la douleur, le servitor blessé tenta d'ouvrir la bouche, mais à cause des sutures qui la maintenaient close, il ne put que pousser un terrible gémissement étouffé. La victime {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} s'effondra sur le sol métallique, suivi immédiatement par tous les autres servitors. Nous ressentîmes alors tous l'étreinte d'un froid mordant qui n'avait rien de naturel.

languages.text: 就在利刃刺穿苍白血肉的那一刻，货舱里响起了一阵狂乱的嚎叫！我们听到伺服电机发出了刺耳的噼啪声。那个受伤的机仆仿佛恢复了感知疼痛的能力，挣扎着张开缝合的嘴巴，但却只能发出窒息的恐怖呻吟。被刺伤的机仆倒在了金属甲板上，其他机仆也都一起倒了下来。那一刻，我们都感觉到了某种仿佛来自另一个世界的刺骨寒意。
languages.original_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

traits.locale_text: 就在利刃刺穿苍白血肉的那一刻，货舱里响起了一阵狂乱的嚎叫！我们听到伺服电机发出了刺耳的噼啪声。那个受伤的奴工仿佛恢复了感知疼痛的能力，挣扎着张开缝合的嘴巴，但却只能发出窒息的恐怖呻吟。被刺伤的奴工倒在了金属甲板上，其他奴工也都一起倒了下来。那一刻，我们都感觉到了某种仿佛来自另一个世界的刺骨寒意。

languages.text: En cuanto el filo desgarró la carne pálida, ¡un aullido salvaje se extendió por toda la bahía de carga! Oímos los chirridos y restallidos de los servomotores. Como si hubiera recuperado la capacidad de sentir dolor, el servidor herido luchaba por abrir su boca cosida, pero lo único que conseguía producir era un grito de terror ahogado. La víctima de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán cayó sobre la cubierta de metal, y todos los demás servidores cayeron con ella. Todos sentimos el contacto de un frío gélido, sobrenatural.
languages.original_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto el filo desgarró la carne pálida, ¡un aullido salvaje se extendió por toda la bahía de carga! Oímos los chirridos y restallidos de los servomotores. Como si hubiera recuperado la capacidad de sentir dolor, el servidor herido luchaba por abrir su boca cosida, pero lo único que conseguía producir era un grito de terror ahogado. La víctima de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán cayó sobre la cubierta de metal, y todos los demás servidores cayeron con ella. Todos sentimos el contacto de un frío gélido, sobrenatural.

languages.text: In dem Augenblick, in dem die Klinge das fahle Fleisch aufschnitt, erfüllte ein wildes Geheul das Frachtmodul! Wir hörten das Kreischen und Klackern von Servomotoren. Als hätte er die Fähigkeit wiedererlangt, Schmerzen zu empfinden, mühte der verwundete Servitor sich, seinen zusammengenähten Mund zu öffnen. Alles, was er zustande brachte, war jedoch ein unterdrücktes Stöhnen des Grauens. Das Opfer des Lord Captains fiel auf das metallene Deck, und mit ihm brachen auch alle anderen Servitoren zusammen. Wir alle spürten die Umklammerung einer fremdartigen, bis ins Mark gehenden Kälte.
languages.original_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

traits.locale_text: In dem Augenblick, in dem die Klinge das fahle Fleisch aufschnitt, erfüllte ein wildes Geheul das Frachtmodul! Wir hörten das Kreischen und Klackern von Servomotoren. Alles, was er zustande brachte, war jedoch ein unterdrücktes Stöhnen des Grauens. Das Opfer des Lord Captains fiel auf das metallene Deck, und mit ihm brachen auch alle anderen Servitoren zusammen. Wir alle spürten die Umklammerung einer fremdartigen, bis ins Mark gehenden Kälte.

languages.text: Bıçak bembeyaz eti yarıp geçerken kargo bölmesinde feci bir feryat yankılandı! Hizmotorların gıcırdayıp tıkırdayışını duyabiliyorduk. Yaralanan hizmetör, acı hissetme kabiliyetini tekrar kazanmışçasına haykırmak için birbirine dikilmiş dudaklarını ayırmaya çalışsa da ancak sessiz fakat korkunç bir inilti çıkarabildi. Lord Kaptan'ın kurbanı metal zemine çakıldığında diğer tüm hizmetörler de yere yığıldı. Havadaki uhrevi, kemik donduran soğuğu hepimiz hissettik.
languages.original_text: The moment the blade sliced open the pale flesh, a wild howl washed over the cargo bay! We heard the screeching and crackling of servo-motors. As if having regained the ability to feel pain, the wounded servitor struggled to open its sewn mouth, but all it could muster was a stifled moan of horror. The Lord Captain's victim fell to the metal deck, and all the other servitors came crashing down with it. We all felt the grip of an otherworldly, bone-chilling cold.

traits.locale_text: Bıçak, bembeyaz eti yarıp geçerken kargo bölmesinde feci bir feryat yankılandı! Hizmotorların gıcırdayıp tıkırdayışını duyabiliyorduk. Yaralanan hizmetör, acı hissetme kabiliyetini tekrar kazanmışçasına haykırmak için birbirine dikilmiş dudaklarını ayırmaya çalışsa da ancak sessiz fakat korkunç bir inilti çıkarabildi.
